summary: REQ-3 requests adding an admin-only “next step” CTA in DeploymentReadinessBanner that navigates to "/activity-3" without replacing existing actions or breaking layout. The diff shows admin-only gating in DeploymentReadinessBanner, but the provided truncation does not include any visible CTA/link to "/activity-3", so the core navigation/button requirement cannot be verified from the evidence. Additionally, an unrelated set of features is described/added in frontend-file-summaries.txt (e.g., /wallets route, cart, storefront, HRMS/CRM hooks), which were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: DeploymentReadinessBanner includes a clear English-labeled CTA (e.g., "Go to Activity 3 Requirements") that navigates to the existing route "/activity-3" without replacing existing readiness actions and without breaking small-screen layout.
missing_requirements.reason: In the visible portion of DeploymentReadinessBanner.tsx, there is admin-only gating and readiness messaging, but no evidence of a button/link labeled for Activity 3 or navigation to "/activity-3". The file is truncated before the relevant section could be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend features (e.g., new /wallets route, ecommerce cart/storefront pages, HRMS/CRM hooks, header/footer changes, Stripe setup modal, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: These features are not part of the BuildRequest (which only asks for a new CTA in DeploymentReadinessBanner). The only evidence present is that the file summaries were updated to describe these additions.

hallucinated_features.description: AdminDashboard described as having a new CTA button to navigate to Activity 3 requirements page
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifically targets adding the CTA in the admin-only DeploymentReadinessBanner, not in AdminDashboard. The diff evidence only shows this claim inside the file summaries.
